info.title: GraphQL API docs
info.description:
GraphQL API connects the blogger, comments and votes service in matter of read -> it returns the full models with all relations loaded from the each service using Apollo Server and RestDataSources

GraphQL is connected through gateway so the client still uses single entry point into the ecosystem.

In order to try out the Graph import Postman Collection in the 'postman-graphql-api' directory in the root directory

post.summary: Gateway for bundling article, comments and votes, read only
